casebody.data:
Carlos SANTIAGO, Appellant/Petitioner(s),
v.
STATE of Florida, Appellee/Respondent(s). CASE NO.: 2D18-3497 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. October 17, 2018

BY ORDER OF THE COURT:

Petitioner has filed a petition for belated appeal in which he is asking for additional time to file an initial brief in case number 2D18-0391. The petition for belated appeal is dismissed and petitioner's filing shall be docketed as a motion for extension of time to file his initial brief in case number 2D18-0391.

LaROSE, C.J., and MORRIS and SALARIO, JJ., Concur.
